articles.title: Hair stylist Nicky Clarke forced to shut Mayfair salon after 30 years as Covid closures take toll - Daily Mail
articles.description: Britain's most famous hair stylist Nicky Clarke has suddenly closed his flagship Mayfair salon after more than 30 years - blaming the pandemic for killing the West End. The salon closed immediately.
